QueryResult.text: with report as ( select job_run_id, phase, field_num, field_name, operation, min(start_date) start_date, max( batch_num ) batches, round( sum(seconds), 3) seconds, round( sum(seconds)/60.0,3 ) minutes, round( sum(seconds)/3600.0,3 ) hours from temp_ts_logs_v group by job_run_id, phase, field_num, field_name, operation order by job_run_id, phase, field_num ) select "JOB_RUN_ID","PHASE","FIELD_NUM","FIELD_NAME","OPERATION","START_DATE","BATCHES","SECONDS","MINUTES","HOURS" from report where job_run_id = (select max(job_run_id) from temp_ts_logs )
